title: Rotating Circle
description: A thrilling ride that spins in circles.
details: Experience the dizzying fun of spinning in circles. Operating hours: 10:00 AM - 7:00 PM. Ticket cost: Child - $4, Adult - $8, Family Pack - $20.

title: Rotating Car Ride
description: A fun-filled car ride with rotations and spins.
details: Spin and twirl on this exciting car ride. Operating hours: 9:00 AM - 9:00 PM. Ticket cost: Child - $5, Adult - $10, Family Pack - $25.

title: Horse Back Ride
description: A calm and scenic horse riding experience.
details: Enjoy a relaxing horseback ride through scenic trails. Operating hours: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM. Ticket cost: Child - $6, Adult - $12, Family Pack - $30.

title: Green Car Roller Coaster
description: A roller coaster designed with eco-friendly concepts.
details: Experience a smooth ride with a green theme. Operating hours: 10:00 AM - 8:00 PM. Ticket cost: Child - $7, Adult - $14, Family Pack - $35.

title: Monkey Roller Coaster
details: Swing through the jungle with twists and turns. Operating hours: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM. Ticket cost: Child - $5, Adult - $10, Family Pack - $25.

title: Sky Jet
description: An adrenaline-pumping jet ride in the sky.
details: Feel the thrill of speed and altitude on this sky-high jet ride. Operating hours: 11:00 AM - 8:00 PM. Ticket cost: Child - $9, Adult - $18, Family Pack - $45.

title: Dragon Train
description: A thrilling train ride through dragon-themed landscapes.
details: Ride through fire-breathing dragons and exciting tunnels. Operating hours: 10:00 AM - 9:00 PM. Ticket cost: Child - $8, Adult - $16, Family Pack - $40.

title: Water Ride
details: Enjoy splashes and waves on this exciting water ride. Operating hours: 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM. Ticket cost: Child - $6, Adult - $12, Family Pack - $30.

title: Water Park Slides
description: Exciting water slides for all age groups.
details: Multiple slides with different heights and speeds. Operating hours: 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM. Ticket cost: Child - $7, Adult - $15, Family Pack - $35.

title: Roll Roller Coaster
description: An exciting roller coaster with rolling features.
details: A unique roller coaster that rolls along twists and turns. Operating hours: 11:00 AM - 9:00 PM. Ticket cost: Child - $6, Adult - $12, Family Pack - $30.

title: Rotating Wheel in Sky
description: A rotating wheel that offers breathtaking views from the sky.
details: Experience a 360-degree view while enjoying the slow rotation. Operating hours: 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM. Ticket cost: Child - $4, Adult - $8, Family Pack - $20.

title: Roller Coaster
description: A fast and thrilling roller coaster ride.
details: This is a high-speed roller coaster with loops and sharp turns. Operating hours: 10:00 AM - 8:00 PM. Ticket cost: Child - $5, Adult - $10, Family Pack - $25.
